oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Correspondence from R.M. Cornin to John S. Brien, April 25, 1860
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this letter, R.M. Cornin is pleading with Judge John S. Brien that Judge Brien visit him en route to the "Baltimore Convention". He discusses the 1860 republican and democratic conventions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States History - Civil War, 1861-1865;
